contentrichtext.text: {{Wiktionarypar|elevation}} '''[[Elevation]]''' is the height of a geographic location above mean sea level '''Elevation''' may also refer to: *[[Elevation (liturgy)]], the lifting of consecrated bread and wine in Mass *Elevation, the lifting effect of the sound source in the center between stereo [[loudspeakers]]. *[[Elevation (ballistics)]], the angle between the horizontal plane and the direction of the barrel of a gun, mortar or heavy artillery *[[Altitude (astronomy)]], one of the coordinates of the horizontal coordinate system used in satellite communication and astronomy *[[Elevation (view)]], an orthographic view, commonly used in architectural drawing to represent a building facade *[[Elevation (kinesiology)]], an anatomical term of motion *[[Elevation (psychology)]], an emotion *Elevation (linguistics), a type of [[semantic change]] *Elevation can be synonymous for vertical [[privilege escalation]], which, in computing, provides a mean of accessing information or performing actions reserved for a system administrator In music and pop culture: *"Elevation", a song by the American band Television from the album ''[[Marquee Moon]]''. *[[Elevation (song)]], U2's 2001 single from the album ''All That You Can't Leave Behind'' *"Elevation", a song by Zion I from ''[[Mind Over Matter (Zion I album)|Mind Over Matter]]'' *"Elevation", a Dutch trance song composed by [[Jack Molenschot]] *[[Elevation Tour]], U2's 2001 concert tour *[[Elevation 2001: U2 Live from Boston]], U2's Elevation Tour concert video release *[[Elevation Partners]], a private equity firm *[[Elevation (Yonder Mountain String Band album)|''Elevation'' (Yonder Mountain String Band album)]] *[[Elevation (Anggun album)|''Elevation'' (Anggun album)]] *[[Elevation (Pharoah Sanders album)|''Elevation'' (Pharoah Sanders album)]] <!--Note: Do not add dictionary definitions here. Wikipedia is not a dictionary. Wiktionary is.--> ==See also== *[[Elevated (disambiguation)]] *[[Elevator (disambiguation)]] {{disambig}}
